messages.messageBody:
Ren Allen wrote:
> " Our "un-
> diagnosis" gradually led me to UNschooling (for the whole family),
and
> here we are today."
>
> Very cool. I wish more parents could see their children as whole and
> wonderful, even with challenges.
> Welcome to the list Jenn.
>
> What part of Virginia are you in? There are a couple radicals on this

> list in your general area...Brandie and I are in Eastern TN, Kelly
and
> several others are in the Carolinas...I think Leslie is over towards
> the coast in VA. ??
>
> Ren


Leslie's in the Beaufort SC area.

Kathe

messages.subject: another intro.
messages.msgSnippet: Our un- diagnosis gradually led me to UNschooling (for the whole family), and here we are today. Very cool. I wish more parents could see their children
messages.messageBody:
" Our "un-
diagnosis" gradually led me to UNschooling (for the whole family), and
here we are today."

Very cool. I wish more parents could see their children as whole and
wonderful, even with challenges.
Welcome to the list Jenn.

What part of Virginia are you in? There are a couple radicals on this
list in your general area...Brandie and I are in Eastern TN, Kelly and
several others are in the Carolinas...I think Leslie is over towards
the coast in VA. ??

Ren
